biotools.summary: IMGT/StructuralQuery is the IMGT® tool to retrieve IMGT/3Dstructure-DB entries using amino acid structural criteria for variable (V), constant (C) or groove (G) domains. Annotation is based on the IMGT-ONTOLOGY concepts.

bioschemas.name: IMGT StructuralQuery
bioschemas.summary: IMGT/StructuralQuery is the IMGT® tool to retrieve IMGT/3Dstructure-DB entries using amino acid structural criteria for variable (V), constant (C) or groove (G) domains. Annotation is based on the IMGT-ONTOLOGY concepts.
